member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransition
member.summary: The BlindTransition class gives you precise control over the Blind transition effects. These simulate venetian blind operations.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransition.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BlindTransition class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransition.Begin
member.summary: Applies the BlindTransition to the target object referenced by the Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.TransitionBase.TargetObject property.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransition.CreateInstanceCore
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the BlindTransition class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransition.TransitionType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of BlindTransition being used.
member.value: A BlindTransitionType enumeration value that specifies the Blindtransition to be used.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransition.TransitionTypeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the TransitionType dependency property.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the BlindTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType.TopToBottom
member.summary: (0x00000000)A Blind growing from top to bottom.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType.LeftToRight
member.summary: (0x00000001)A Blind growing from left to right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType.GrowingLeftToRight
member.summary: A Blind growing from left to right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType.GrowingRightToLeft
member.summary: A Blind growing from right to left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType.GrowingTopToBottom
member.summary: A Blind growing from top to bottom.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.BlindTransitionType.GrowingBottomToTop
member.summary: A Blind growing from bottom to top.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the CircularWipeTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterClockwiseFromLeft
member.summary: Wipe circle center clockwise from left. Starting from the 9:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterCounterclockwiseFromLeft
member.summary: Wipe circle center counterclockwise from left. Starting from the 9:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterClockwiseFromRight
member.summary: Wipe circle center clockwise from right. Starting from the 3:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterCounterclockwiseFromRight
member.summary: Wipe circle center counterclockwise from right. Starting from the 3:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterClockwiseFromTop
member.summary: Wipe circle center clockwise from top. Starting from the 12:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterCounterclockwiseFromTop
member.summary: Wipe circle center counterclockwise from top. Starting from the 12:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterClockwiseFromBottom
member.summary: Wipe circle center clockwise from bottom. Starting from the 6:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.CenterCounterclockwiseFromBottom
member.summary: Wipe circle center counterclockwise from bottom. Starting from the 6:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.LeftClockwiseFromTop
member.summary: Wipe circle left clockwise from top. Starting from the 12:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the left edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.LeftCounterclockwiseFromBottom
member.summary: Wipe circle left counterclockwise from bottom. Starting from the 6:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the left edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.RightClockwiseFromBottom
member.summary: Wipe circle right clockwise from bottom. Starting from the 6:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the right edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.RightCounterclockwiseFromTop
member.summary: Wipe circle right counterclockwise from top. Starting from the 12:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the left edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.TopClockwiseFromRight
member.summary: Wipe circle top clockwise from right. Starting from the 6:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the right edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.TopCounterclockwiseFromLeft
member.summary: Wipe circle top counterclockwise from left. Starting from the 9:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the top edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.BottomClockwiseFromLeft
member.summary: Wipe circle bottom clockwise from left. Starting from the 9:00 position and moving clockwise (with the origin at the center of the bottom edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.CircularWipeTransitionType.BottomCounterclockwiseFromRight
member.summary: Wipe circle bottom counterclockwise from right. Starting from the 3:00 position and moving counterclockwise (with the origin at the center of the bottom edge of the image), the new image appears as if swept in by the minute hand.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the EllipticalTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.CenterIn
member.summary: Ellipse center in. The old image remains underneath. The new image appears in the area outside the ellipse which is centered in the image but is very large. The ellipse gets smaller and smaller and as it does more of the new image appears.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.CenterOut
member.summary: Ellipse center out. The old image remains underneath. The new image appears in a elliptical shape, starting very small in the center of the image and growing outward.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.LeftIn
member.summary: Ellipse left in. The ellipse is very large, and has its center to the left of the left edge of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pulled to the left, and as it is pulled it pulls in the new image starting from the right side and moving left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.LeftOut
member.summary: Ellipse left out. The ellipse is very large, and has its center to the left of the left edge of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pushed to the right and as it is pushed the new image appears starting from the left and moving to the right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.RightIn
member.summary: Ellipse right in. The ellipse is very large, and has its center to the right of the right edge of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pulled to the right, and as it is pulled it pulls in the new image starting from the left side and moving right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.RightOut
member.summary: Ellipse right out. The ellipse is very large, and completely to the right of the right edge of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pushed to the left and as it is pushed the new image appears starting from the right and moving to the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.TopIn
member.summary: Ellipse top in. The ellipse is very large, and has its center above the top edge of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pulled vertically, and as it is pulled it pulls in the new image starting from the bottom and moving to the top.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.TopOut
member.summary: Ellipse top out. The ellipse is very large, and completely above the top of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pushed to the bottom and as it is pushed the new image appears starting from the top and moving to the bottom.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.BottomIn
member.summary: Ellipse bottom in. The ellipse is very large, and has its center below the bottom edge of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pulled down to the bottom, and as it is pulled it pulls in the new image starting from the top and moving to the bottom.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.BottomOut
member.summary: Ellipse bottom out. The ellipse is very large, and completely below the bottom of the image. The ellipse remains the same size. It is pushed to the top and as it is pushed the new image appears starting from the bottom and moving to the top.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.CenterInterlaceInIn
member.summary: Ellipse center interlace in then in. A series of concentric elliptical rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the outward edges. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the outward edges and moving to the center.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.CenterInterlaceOutOut
member.summary: Ellipse center interlace out then out. A series of concentric elliptical rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the center. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the center and moving outward to the center.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.CenterInterlaceInOut
member.summary: Ellipse center interlace in then out. A series of concentric elliptical rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the outward edges. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the center and moving toward the edges.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.EllipticalTransitionType.CenterInterlaceOutIn
member.summary: Ellipse center interlace out then in. A series of concentric elliptical rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the center. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the outward edges and moving to the center.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the LinearWipeTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.LeftToRight
member.summary: Wipe left to right. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the left edge moving toward the right edge.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.RightToLeft
member.summary: Wipe right to left. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the right edge moving toward the left edge.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.TopToBottom
member.summary: Wipe top to bottom. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the top edge moving toward the bottom edge.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.BottomToTop
member.summary: Wipe bottom to top. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the bottom edge moving toward the top edge.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.LeftTopToRightBottom
member.summary: Wipe left-top to right-bottom. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the top left corner, moving along a diagonal toward the bottom right corner.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.RightTopToLeftBottom
member.summary: Wipe right-top to left-bottom. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the top right corner moving along a diagonal toward the bottom left corner.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.LeftBottomToRightTop
member.summary: Wipe left-bottom to right-top. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the bottom left corner moving along a diagonal toward the top right corner.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.LinearWipeTransitionType.RightBottomToLeftTop
member.summary: Wipe right-bottom to left-top. The old image remains underneath. The new image unrolls from the left edge moving toward the right edge.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.PushTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the PushTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.PushTransitionType.LeftToRight
member.summary: Push left to right. The new image pushes out the old image, moving from left to right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.PushTransitionType.RightToLeft
member.summary: Push right to left. The new image pushes out the old image, moving from right to left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.PushTransitionType.TopToBottom
member.summary: Push top to bottom. The new image pushes out the old image, moving from top to bottom.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.PushTransitionType.BottomToTop
member.summary: Push bottom to top. The new image pushes out the old image, moving from bottom to top.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the RectangularTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType.Out
member.summary: (0x00000003)(0x00000000)Wipe rectangle out. The old image remains in place. A small rectangle of the new image appears in the center and grows outward until the old image is covered.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType.In
member.summary: (0x00000002)(0x00000001)Wipe rectangle in. The old image begins disappearing, starting from the edges and moving toward the center.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType.InterlaceInIn
member.summary: Wipe rectangle interlace in then in. A series of concentric rectangular rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the outward edges. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the outward edges and moving to the center.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType.InterlaceOutOut
member.summary: Wipe rectangle interlace out then out. A series of concentric rectangular rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the center. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the center and moving outward to the center.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType.InterlaceInOut
member.summary: Wipe rectangle interlace in then out. A series of concentric rectangular rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the outward edges. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the center and moving toward the edges.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RectangularTransitionType.InterlaceOutIn
member.summary: Wipe rectangle interlace out then in. A series of concentric rectangular rings begin appearing, covering the old image, starting from the center. When that operation completes, the rest of the image gets filled in, starting from the outward edges and moving to the center.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RotateTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the RotateTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RotateTransitionType.LeftToRight
member.summary: Rotate from left to right. The old image remains in place. The new image begins appearing from the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RotateTransitionType.RightToLeft
member.summary: Rotate from right to left. The old image remains in place. The new image begins appearing from the right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RotateTransitionType.TopToBottom
member.summary: Rotate from top to bottom. The old image remains in place. The new image begins appearing from the top.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.RotateTransitionType.BottomToTop
member.summary: Rotate from bottom to top. The old image remains in place. The new image begins appearing from the bottom.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.SlideTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the SlideTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.SlideTransitionType.LeftToRight
member.summary: Slide from left to right. The old image remains in place. The new image slides in from the right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.SlideTransitionType.RightToLeft
member.summary: Slide from right to left. The old image remains in place. The new image slides in from the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.SlideTransitionType.TopToBottom
member.summary: Slide from top to bottom. The old image remains in place. The new image slides in from the bottom.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.SlideTransitionType.BottomToTop
member.summary: Slide from bottom to top. The old image remains in place. The new image slides in from the to[.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.ZoomTransitionType
member.summary: Values for the ZoomTransition.TransitionType property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.ZoomTransitionType.FromCenter
member.summary: Zoom from center. The image starts out very small and grows larger, staying centered.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.Transitions.ZoomTransitionType.ToCenter
member.summary: Zoom to center. The image starts out large and grows very small, staying centered.
